import React, {Component} from 'react' import {List,ListItem,ListItemText,Paper} from '@material-ui/core' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import CardDeck from 'react-bootstrap/CardDeck' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup' import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroupItem' class Cart extends Component { createTask = item => { return (

{item.location}

{item.name}

{item.price}

 ) } render() { const totalPrice = 0 const items = this.props.items const listItems = items.map(this.createTask) return (

Cart

{listItems}

{items.reduce((totalPrice, items) => parseFloat(totalPrice) + parseFloat(items.price), 0)}

 ) } } export default Cart
